00116 #if !defined(__COMPILE_H)
00117 #define __COMPILE_H 1
00118 
00119 int InitCPPStruct(void);
00120 
00121 typedef struct Options_Rec{
00122     const char *profileString;
00123     int ErrorMode;
00124     int Quiet;
00125    
00126     // Debug The Compiler options:
00127     int DumpAtomTable;
00128 } Options;
00129 
00130 struct CPPStruct_Rec {
00131     // Public members
00132     SourceLoc *pLastSourceLoc;  // Set at the start of each statement by the tree walkers
00133     Options options;            // Compile options and parameters
00134 
00135     // Private members
00136     SourceLoc lastSourceLoc;
00137 
00138     // Scanner data:
00139 
00140     SourceLoc *tokenLoc;        // Source location of most recent token seen by the scanner
00141     int mostRecentToken;        // Most recent token seen by the scanner
00142     InputSrc *currentInput;
00143     int previous_token;
00144     int notAVersionToken;      // used to make sure that #version is the first token seen in the file, if present
00145     
00146    void *pC;                   // storing the parseContext of the compile object in cpp.  
00147      
00148     // Private members:
00149     SourceLoc ltokenLoc;
00150    int ifdepth;                //current #if-#else-#endif nesting in the cpp.c file (pre-processor)    
00151     int elsedepth[64];          //Keep a track of #if depth..Max allowed is 64.   
00152     int elsetracker;            //#if-#else and #endif constructs...Counter.
00153     const char *ErrMsg;
00154     int CompileError;           //Indicate compile error when #error, #else,#elif mismatch.
00155 
00156     //
00157     // Globals used to communicate between PaParseStrings() and yy_input()and 
00158     // also across the files.(gen_glslang.cpp and scanner.c)
00159     //
00160     int    PaWhichStr;            // which string we're parsing
00161     int*   PaStrLen;              // array of lengths of the PaArgv strings
00162     int    PaArgc;                // count of strings in the array
00163     char** PaArgv;                // our array of strings to parse    
00164     unsigned int tokensBeforeEOF : 1;
00165 };
00166 
00167 #endif // !defined(__COMPILE_H)
